external_games.name: Snail Trek: Chapter 2 - A Snail of Two Worlds
Snail Trek - Chapter 2: A Snail Of Two Worlds

name: Snail Trek: Chapter 2 - A Snail of Two Worlds
storyline: Relive 1980s nostalgia in this text parser driven graphic adventure game. You and your molluscan crew embark on an epic journey to find a new home world. In Chapter 2 - A Snail Of Two Worlds, you are stranded on an alien planet searching for food, water, and most of all... answers.
summary: An adventure game from Phil Fortier.
